title: [Resolved] 23.8.2016 LCU Testing Temporarily Offline
body:
Hi Folks!

Due to some emergent issues that could potentially impact your testing experience we'll be taking the client alpha offline this evening (23 Aug) at ~5:00PM AEST. During this outage players will be unable to access the updated client alpha. At this time we do not have an estimate for when the client will be available but we'll be sure to keep you all updated as the issue develops.

Thanks for testing!

Mindstar

replies.body:
LCU is back online!

Cheers
Mindstar
